content: सपिंडीकरणं {@--1@} The performance of a particular Śrāddha in honour of deceased relatives called सपिंड <ab>q. v.</ab>, to be performed at the end of one full year after the death of a relative, but now usually performed on the 12th day after death as part of the funeral obsequies. {@--2@} Giving a person the rights of a Sapiṇḍa or kinsman.
